snippet: The author of a pulp fiction novel that has recently gained notoriety on the Web would not have been satisfied being described as a pulp fiction writer.
abstract: The author of a pulp fiction novel that has recently gained notoriety on the Web would not have been satisfied being described as a pulp fiction writer.

headline.main: Her Name Was Eileen. His? Halper. Albert Halper.
headline.print_headline: It Was Summer. Her Name Was Eileen. His? Halper. Albert Halper.
